column5: Will be staying overnight in Minnesota on Sunday before fishing the angle. Can anyone give recommendations on a safe place to stay since I will be towing my boat?Thanks
Where are you staying at in canada?
Try the casino in Warroad. Big well lit lot.
If you are crossing at Baudette , we stayed at the AmercInn on the west end of town , reasonable price and clean , plus a good place to eat next door
You would not cross at Baudette to go to the Angle.
Depends where hes coming from if he crosses at Baudette or not? Hes very vage on his post.
He said he was fishing the Angle.

So if your fishing the angle and staying on flag island wouldnt you be driving through Baudette? I do know a few that go through Baudette and boat to the area around flag island from morson. They thinks its easier than the road to the landing.
What im saying he can stay at americinn. I was a little messed up for a bit on how to get to the angle. I know how but my brain wasnt awake.
If at Baudette, Walleye Inn. Bill
